      • calculatePosition

        private static void calculatePosition(Bus bus)
        Calculates next position of the bus. If one reaches bus stop, registers it in the bus stop queue as well as changes its internal state to BUSSTOP.
        Parameters:
        bus -

      • queryForWaitingPassengers

        private static boolean queryForWaitingPassengers(BusStop busStop)
        Queries for number of waiting passengers at given bus stop.
        Parameters:
        busStop - bus stop to be queried
        Returns:
        true if at least one passenger is waiting

      • withdrawBus

        public static void withdrawBus(int busId)
        Withdraws bus of given id. Bus will be withdrawn to the depot at the moment of the arrival to the terminus.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus id

      • sendFromDepot

        public static void sendFromDepot(int busId)
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot. It clears bus cycles count.
        Parameters:
        busId - id of the bus

      • sendFromDepot

        public void sendFromDepot()
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot.

      • sendFromTerminus

        public static void sendFromTerminus(int busId)
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after being at the terminus. Increments bus cycles count.
        Parameters:
        busId - id of the bus
